entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
